showerReviews.reviewText: Campground host was not pleasant in any way. The showers were gross. The toilets were pretty rough. The bathrooms have those fake mirror things so you can't actually see a reflection. Between the spiders the frogs and the awful shower ‚Ä¶

Love the campground. They had a problem with the water tower so no restroom or shower.  They should have advised at the gate or at least the campground host. Make sure you have a surge protector. Had a problem which they fixed.
Campground is unkept, tall grass and the shower house was filthy with absolutely NO warm water.

‚Ä¶ not much shade. The bathrooms are also nearby and seems well maintained. If you're there for a few days and want to take a shower, don't count on having hot water though. It seems popular for families to take their kids too, so if you ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Crappie Cove is nice. Lots of trees. But not full hook up. My DIL went to take a shower this past weekend (07-29-23), and only 1 shower worked

Visited with my sister for a competitive trail competition. Nice bathroom/shower facilities. Security comes through every 30 minutes or so. Shaded campsites. Easy in/out for trailers and pens for the horses next to the campsite.
‚Ä¶ We sometimes see deer here and the stars are amazing!  This year we went there to watch the Geminid Meteor shower.  We weren't disappointed.

‚Ä¶ This park is definitely family friendly, and seems to cater to the wealthier KC suburbs. Boat rentals and stuff are pretty pricey. There are shower facilities down by the beach, and the lake is pretty. Decent hiking trails.

‚Ä¶ but could  use some improvements such as replacing  trees  which have been  cut down  over the years.  One of the  sites we stayed  in with our camper could use a fresh topping  if gravel. Shower houses are OK but need to be freshening  up.

‚Ä¶ .  Campsites were spacious.  Firewood for sale was a joke at $1 per "stick".  Bathrooms were so gross I felt dirtier coming out of the shower than when I went in.  Dirty, mildewy shower curtains.  Floors appeared clean.  Toilets ‚Ä¶
I was highly impressed with the camping sites. The shower houses were clean and the water was hot. There was no hand soap in the bathroom though. The beach was nice. This place is beautiful.

‚Ä¶ wheel right off the lake for 6 days. Fishing, trails, and full hook ups or pitch a tent with no connections at all. It's a pet friendly area and has shower houses that I would give an 8 out if 10 rating overall. I will be back, FOR SURE!
